turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to make a pizza order from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like two pizzas, small size, both pepperoni, thin crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, would you like to add any sides or drinks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok so you have ordered 2 small pepperoni pizzas with thin crust, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your total will be $26, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and will you be dining in, picking up, or having it delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: pickup

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas will be ready for pickup in 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be texted to you, show show it at the counter.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks.
